title: も
description: Also, Too, As well, Even, Either, Neither

title: がいる
description: To be, There is,  To remain (in a state)

title: の
description: Verb nominalizer, The one who..., That which...

title: へ行く
description: To go to, To head toward

title: に行く
description: To go to, To head toward

title: がある
description: Noun (B) that has Noun (A), Noun (B) with Noun (A)

title: のある
description: Noun (B) that has Noun (A), Noun (B) with Noun (A)

title: ので
description: Because, So, Since, The reason being

title: ので
description: Because, So, Since, The reason being

title: なので
description: Because, So, Since, The reason being

title: なので
description: Because, So, Since, The reason being

title: に行く
description: To go ~, To go in order to ~

patterns.conjugation: 連用形-一般|連用形-五段|連用形-撥音便
連用形-一般|連用形-五段|連用形-撥音便

title: て
tests: 宿題を終え{て}、遊びに行った。

title: まだ〜ていない
tests: 昼ご飯を{まだ食べていない}

title: まだ〜ていません
tests: 宿題は{まだ終わっていません}

title: てもいい
description: It is alright/fine/okay even if, Can/may, ~ is also okay

title: でもいい
description: It is alright/fine/okay even if, Can/may, ~ is also okay

title: でもいい
description: It is alright/fine/okay even if, Can/may, ~ is also okay

title: たくなかった
tests: 学校に行き{たくなかった}

title: たり〜たりする
tests: 週末はテレビを見{たり本を読んだりする}

title: けっこう
tests: この料理は{けっこう}辛い

title: けっこうだ
tests: いいえ、もう{けっこうです}

title: たくさん
tests: 昨日、本を{たくさん}買った
description: Many, A lot of, Plenty, Enough

title: たくさんの
tests: {たくさんの}お金があります
description: Many, A lot of, Plenty, Enough

title: 前に
tests: 食べる{前に}手を洗います

title: の前に
tests: テスト{の前に}勉強する

title: まで
description: Until, Till, To (but no further than)

title: にする
description: To decide on, To choose, To make something into, To view something as

title: 誰か
tests: ドアのところに{誰か}いますか？

title: どこか
tests: 鍵を{どこか}に忘れました。

title: 誰も
tests: その質問には{誰も}答えられなかった。

title: どこも
tests: 休日は{どこも}人が多いです。

title: ませんか
description: Won't you, Would you not, Why don't we

title: てもいい
description: It's okay to, It's alright to, Can/may

title: なくてはいけない
tests: 行か{なくてはいけない}

title: なくちゃいけない
tests: 行か{なくちゃいけない}

title: なくてはならない
tests: 行か{なくてはならない}

title: なくちゃならない
tests: 行か{なくちゃならない}

title: たほうがいい
description: It'd be better to, Should do

title: ないほうがいい
description: It'd be better not to, Shouldn't do

title: のが下手
description: To be bad at, Poor at, Unskillful

title: あげる
description: To give (away), To present, To provide

title: もらう
description: To receive, To get, To obtain

title: つもりだ
description: To plan to, To intend to

title: ないつもりだ
description: To plan to, To intend to

title: つもりはない
description: To plan to, To intend to
